@TommoFowler It is true, I have only assisted twice professionally, but the last few shows I’ve directed sold out, won awards and were offered or given west end transfers. I don’t understand why that counts for less than assisting. I’ve been prioritising my own craft.
@TommoFowler Fabulous idea. I’ll start an excel spreadsheet.
@TommoFowler I am in a grump about this because the last few interviews I’ve had for directing (not assisting) jobs I’ve been hit with “you’ve not done much assisting, have you?”
@TommoFowler That, or for the industry to value actually directing successful fringe plays half as much as it values sitting quietly and making tea for established directors.
